title: cmd/gofmt: inconsistent spaces around bitwise &
body:
Go version: `go version go1.5.1 linux/amd64`

What I did: used gofmt on my source code
What I expected: have spaces around bitwise `&` everywhere
What I saw: in one occasion there was no spaces around the operator

I have put "before" and "after" code into a [gist](https://gist.github.com/RomanSaveljev/ced32bbe4324d95e6c49/revisions?diff=split), so from the diff you can easily see the changes applied by gofmt
